bs-uploader-drop-or-click: Drag & drop file here or click to select file for upload
bs-multiupload-tag-button-desc: Shows a button that allows pre-configured uploads to the wiki
bs-multiupload-tag-dropzone-desc: Shows a dropzone that allows pre-configured uploads to the wiki
bs-multiupload-tag-dropzone-label-defaul: Drag and drop a file here to start upload
bs-multiupload-tag-hint-reloadpage: The page will be reloaded now
